Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Circular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Timagoras. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0219.27.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (262)
